Purpose of the SMTS Portal
The
SMTS Portal
was created to monitor and track the status of
a project to scan and convert Veteranâ€™s records that are currently in a paper format, and

title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Veterans Claims Intake Program (VCIP) Shipping
